about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our platform
about.description: Dozo is a trusted platform that connects people who need help with everyday tasks with skilled professionals who can get the job done. Whether you need help with moving, cleaning, repairs, or any other task, we make it easy to find qualified taskers in your area.
about.step1: 1. Browse available tasks or post your own task describing what you need
about.step2: 2. Review applications from qualified taskers and choose the best fit
about.step3: 3. Communicate with your tasker through our messaging system
about.step4: 4. Mark the task as complete and leave a review
about.taskerStep1: 1. Register as a tasker and complete your profile with ID verification
about.taskerStep2: 2. Browse available tasks and apply to ones that match your skills
about.taskerStep3: 3. Communicate with clients and complete the work professionally
about.taskerStep4: 4. Build your reputation with positive reviews
about.creditsDescription: Our platform uses a credit system where 1 credit = 100 MDL task value. New users receive 10 free credits upon registration!
careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join Our Team
careers.description: Thank you for your interest in joining our team. At this time, we don't have any open positions. Please check back later or follow us on social media for updates.
careers.stayConnected: Stay connected and check back for future opportunities!
help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
help.faq.howItWorks.a: Clients post tasks, taskers apply, clients choose the best applicant, work gets done, and both parties leave reviews.
help.faq.credits.q: What are credits and how do they work?
help.faq.credits.a: Credits are used to post tasks. 1 credit equals 100 MDL task value. You receive 10 free credits when you register, and can purchase more as needed.
help.faq.becomeTasker.q: How do I become a tasker?
help.faq.becomeTasker.a: Register with a tasker account, complete your profile, upload your ID for verification, and wait for admin approval. Once approved, you can start applying to tasks.
help.faq.verification.q: Why do I need ID verification?
help.faq.verification.a: ID verification ensures the safety and trust of our community. Only taskers need to verify their ID; clients posting tasks do not.
help.faq.payments.a: Clients and taskers agree on the price. Payment is arranged directly between both parties after the work is completed.
help.faq.safety.a: Yes! All taskers undergo ID verification and background checks. We have community guidelines and a dedicated support team to ensure safety.
help.faq.disputes.q: What if there's a problem with a task?
help.faq.disputes.a: Contact our support team immediately through the Contact Us page or message system. We'll work to resolve any issues fairly.
help.faq.reviews.a: After a task is completed, both the client and tasker can leave reviews for each other. Reviews help build trust in our community.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contact.description: Have a question or need assistance? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.loginRequired: Please log in to send a message
guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Building a respectful and safe community
guidelines.intro: To ensure a positive experience for everyone, all users must follow these community guidelines:
guidelines.respect.title: Respect & Professionalism
guidelines.respect.content: Treat all users with respect and professionalism. Harassment, discrimination, hate speech, or abusive behavior will not be tolerated.
guidelines.honesty.title: Honesty & Transparency
guidelines.honesty.content: Provide accurate information in your profile, task descriptions, and applications. Be honest about your skills, availability, and pricing.
guidelines.safety.title: Safety First
guidelines.safety.content: Never share personal financial information or passwords. Meet in public places when appropriate and trust your instincts.
guidelines.quality.title: Quality Work
guidelines.quality.content: Taskers should deliver quality work as described. Clients should provide clear instructions and fair compensation.
guidelines.communication.title: Clear Communication
guidelines.communication.content: Respond to messages promptly and keep all communication on the platform for your protection.
guidelines.prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
guidelines.prohibited.content: Do not post illegal services, spam, or scam. No fake reviews or manipulation of the rating system.
guidelines.consequences.title: Consequences
guidelines.consequences.content: Violations may result in warnings, account suspension, or permanent ban depending on severity.
guidelines.reporting: If you witness or experience guideline violations, please report them to our support team immediately.
trustSafety.title: Trust & Safety
trustSafety.subtitle: Your safety is our priority
trustSafety.commitment: We're committed to creating a safe and trustworthy platform for all users.
trustSafety.verification.title: Identity Verification
trustSafety.verification.content: All taskers must complete ID verification before they can apply to tasks. This includes uploading a government-issued ID and selfie for comparison.
trustSafety.screening.title: Background Screening
trustSafety.screening.content: Taskers undergo background checks as part of our verification process to ensure community safety.
trustSafety.reviews.title: Review System
trustSafety.reviews.content: Our two-way review system allows clients and taskers to rate each other, building trust and accountability in our community.
trustSafety.support.title: 24/7 Support
trustSafety.support.content: Our support team is available to help resolve issues, answer questions, and ensure your experience is safe and positive.
trustSafety.secure.title: Secure Platform
trustSafety.secure.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information and maintain platform integrity.
trustSafety.tips.title: Safety Tips
trustSafety.tips.1: Keep all communication on the platform
trustSafety.tips.2: Check tasker reviews and ratings before hiring
trustSafety.tips.3: Never share passwords or financial account details
trustSafety.tips.5: Meet in public places when appropriate
trustSafety.tips.6: Trust your instincts - if something feels wrong, it probably is
trustSafety.reportDescription: If you experience or witness unsafe behavior, please contact our support team immediately.

agreement.title: Application Agreement
agreement.term1: The Applicant agrees to perform the task for the posted amount.
agreement.term2: The Applicant is not obligated to perform the task if material circumstances arise that were not reasonably known at the time of applying (e.g., substantially different scope, unsafe conditions, or missing information).
agreement.term3: This agreement is not an employment contract and does not create an employer-employee relationship.
agreement.term4: Messaging within the platform should be used to clarify scope and logistics.
agreement.term5: Either party may cancel before work begins if a mutual understanding cannot be reached.
agreement.mustAgree: You must agree to the terms before proceeding
